welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kurri Kurri, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. Get ready to explore and experience the unique charm of this town. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maitland Airport offers domestic flights to major cities in Australia.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Maitland Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cessnock Airport serves all domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belmont Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Belmont Airport handles all freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Williamtown Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to regional flights within Australia.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
